main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted that resembled a bright flash of light moving at high speed in Oregon City.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object initially appeared to be stationary before moving eastward at high speed., It was observed to split into two objects, with the second object having three or four visible portholes., The observer noted the object's movement was under intelligent control., Binoculars were used by an observer to observe the object more closely.
witness description: various observers including a bus driver and radio station personnel
